19214.quoteText: You must be age 13 (or equivalent minimum age in your Home Country, as set forth in the registration process) to create an account and use our Services.

19217.quoteDoc: Apple Media Services Terms and Conditions
19217.quoteText: If any part of this Agreement is held invalid or unenforceable, that portion shall be construed in a manner consistent with applicable law to reflect, as nearly as possible, the original intentions of the parties, and the remaining portions shall remain in full force and effect.
19217.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

19218.quoteDoc: Apple Media Services Terms and Conditions
